About.Officer in charge: Local and Family History Officer: Jacque Zagotsis

About.Hours & facilities: Open daily, Local History Officer not available on Tuesdays and some Saturdays.

About.Acquisition focus: Collection contains books, photographs, ephemera pertaining to Riverland District, particularly Berri Barmera Council area. Also have a family history collection, with books, CDRoms and Original Death Certificates for the District of Murray.

Contact.Street address: Berri Library & Information Centre, Kay Avenue, Berri, S.A., 5343
